heading: Gamescom Vessel of Hatred: Mercenaries Reveal!
content: Diablo 4 Vessel of Hatred (VoH) expansion is featured at Gamescom, starting on August 20th. During the opening ceremony, many news about what's coming have been announced! Let's discover them together. You can also take a look at made an appearance to announce what we can expect to discover during Gamescom about the We will know more about these new dungeons very soon during Gamescom so stay tuned on While we're waiting for Vessel of Hatred news from Gamescom, we hope you enjoy the Season of the Infernal Hordes with the aid of our guides. The focus now is to keep things up to date with the 1.5.1 patch coming early next week and to make sure our are still solid material. We're continuing to work on more updates! With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 5 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
